jd: From: Senthil, SecureKloud senthilbabu.s@securekloud.com Reply to: senthilbabu.s@securekloud.com Job Title: Azure Cloud Engineer Location: Remote Long term contract Dont share DevOps profile we need Azure engineers Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities: - The candidate will play an integral role in developing a cloud Adoption strategy for how to migrate workloads to cloud- Works with the client IT Teams (Network / Security / Operations / Infrastructure) to understand their current state and design the target desired state- Translate application requirements to cloud technology infrastructure components for migration purposes- Gather accurate information to explain concepts, and answer critical questions- Advising on implementing cloud best practices related to governance, operations and security. Qualifications: - 10+ yrs experience in IT Bachelor’s or master’s Degree in technical discipline or relevant experience- Minimum 5 years in Azure Cloud hands on experience with strong technical knowledge of Azure Services, Policies, Monitoring tools etc.,- Must be familiar with Policy Driven Governance, Azure landing zones, ARM Templates or Bicep etc.,- Strong technical knowledge of serverless, DevOps, pipeline as code and Infrastructure as code.- Strong understanding of Network and Security concepts.- Must be able to implement solutions using at least one of the popular programming languages (Java, Python, Typescript, JavaScript, .NET)- Must be proactive, demonstrative initiative and be a logical thinker- Ability to think critically, and work logically under pressure Nice to Have: - Certification at any level of any one cloud provider- Agile experience- Open-source contributions- Programming skills in either Java, Python, .NET, Node JS (JavaScript, Typescript)
